info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:45PM EDT until May 16 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ULSTER...WESTERN COLUMBIA...SOUTHEASTERN SARATOGA AND WESTERN RENSSELAER COUNTIES... At 444 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mechanicville to near Grafton to Austerlitz to Chester, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Troy, Clifton Park, East Greenbush, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Hudson, Mechanicville, Saugerties, Nassau, Claverack, Ballston Spa, Menands, Livingston, Green Island, Waterford, Clermont, Valatie, Castleton-On-Hudson, Philmont and Kinderhook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
